attributes.action: that the House of Commons should thus be renamed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the scandal of member’s immoral use of expenses that there clearly is Institutional Corruption in Parliament that the House of Commons should thus be renamed House of Corruption. And until such time honest and noble states people can be found to repopulate it thus is abolished from sitting. 
God rest Cromwell’s soul as he once said to a similar bunch of wastrels "weeds and nettles, briars and thorns, have thriven under your shadow, dissettlement and divisions, discontentment and dissatisfaction, together with real dangers to the whole"

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
